Sauce Labs | Developers, sales, support, more | Berlin and SF | Onsite usually

I work for the Berlin office of Sauce Labs (nee TestObject), and we provide a testing platform for app developers. Perform manual or live tests on a large library of Android and iOS devices.

We work mostly in Java, with a lot of low level device work trying to keep devices reliable and clean for our users. I love my job, my coworkers, and would love to answer any questions about the job.

Our jobs page is here: https://testobject.workable.com/

And our parent company Sauce Labs has a bunch more jobs in SF: https://saucelabs.com/company/careers
